commitResults.messageTitle: add skeletal code for greeting and farewell
Add Level-1 requirements and Singlish mode
commitResults.messageBody:
Program has Level-0 requirements: Add greeting and farewell messages to Duke

Missing Level-1 requirements and customization

Adding the following features allows us to fufill Level-1 requirements
* add greetings during the start of the program
* add farewell messages when user inputs "bye"

Adding customization as encouraged on the CS2113 website
* add a Singlish mode in Duke with variations in text
* add a command "change lang" to toggle it on and off

Program has Level-1 requirements and Singlish mode.

Missing Level-2 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fufill Level-2 requirements.
* add the ability for user to enter up to 100 strings of text into a
list.
* return the list of texts entered when the command "list" is entered.
* stop program from echoing the text entered.

Program has Level-2 requirements.

Missing some features to prevent program from crashing.

Adding the following features allows us to catch these errors.
* add the ability to inform the user that the list is full
* stop the program from adding empty text into the list

Program has Level-2 requirements.

Missing level-3 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill level-3 requirements.
* add the ability for user to mark and unmark a task on the list
* implement a Task Class as the data structure for tasks in a list

commitResults.messageTitle: Update codebase to follow a coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
Program has Level-3 requirements.

Does not following a particular coding standard.

Implementing the following changes allows us to follow a coding standard
* change codebase to follow the following java coding standard:
https://se-education.org/guides/conventions/java/basic.html

commitResults.messageTitle: Change how the list of tasks is stored
commitResults.messageBody:
Tasks are currently stored in a fixed-sized array.

Lacking the ability to store more than 100 tasks in the list.

Adding the following features allows us to add more than 100 tasks to
the list.
* change the underlying data structure to ArrayList
* amend affected methods by the change of data structure

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for 3 types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Program has Level-3 requirements.

Missing level-4 requirements.

Adding the following features partially allows us to fulfill level-4
requirements.
* add the ability for user to label tasks as TODO, DEADLINE or
EVENT when adding them into the list

commitResults.messageTitle: Add support for 3 types of tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Only one type of task is supported (TODO).

Missing the ability to add tasks with dates, which is a level-4
requirement

Adding the following features partially allows us to fulfill the level-4
requirements
* allow user to add 3 types of tasks: "todo", "deadline" and "event"
* allow user to mark and unmark them like previously

commitResults.messageTitle: Edit runtest.bat file to match Class in folder

commitResults.messageBody:
Three type of tasks are supported (TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT).

Failing to catch errors when user enters invalid commands.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill level-4 requirements
* catch errors when user enters invalid commands
* fix formatting issues such as extra spaces

Three type of tasks are supported (TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT).

Code violates code quality outlines here:
https://nus-cs2113-ay2223s2.github.io/website/se-book-adapted/chapters/
codeQuality.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill code quality
requirements
* refactor methods used in main() in Class Duke
* add Class Greetings for output related text
* shift functions that was previously in main(), such as sayHello() to
Greetings.
* add Javadoc to methods in all the classes
* simplify expressions by refactoring them into a variable
* refactor magic numbers used in into constants

Codebase has level-4 requirements.

improvements can be made to the text printed to output and code quality.

Adding the following features allows us to add improvements to codebase
* add response text when user adds a new task on the list
* edit a variable name (descOfTask to descriptionOfTask) so it is
clearer

commitResults.messageTitle: Update Singlish text support for all commands
commitResults.messageBody:
Codebase has level-4 requirements.

Certain commands lack support for Singlish text.

Adding the following features allows us to support Singlish mode
* add singlish text to inform user when task is added
* fix a bug about duplicate greetings when changing language

Three type of tasks are supported (TODO, DEADLINE, EVENT).

Missing level-5 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill level-5 requirements
* add DukeException class for handling custom exceptions
* add exceptions to handle all the possible errors

Adding the following features allows us to improve code quality
* refactor code to make HAPPY path more prominent

Program has level-5 requirements.

Missing level-6 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill level-6 requirements
* add a way for user to delete a task on the list.

Adding the following features allows us to improve code quality
* add and update javadoc for clarity and spelling mistakes
* update previous implementation of the index value of tasks. Tasks no
longer keep track of their index value. This is replaced by referencing
the index with respect to their order in the list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Update codebase with level-7 requirements and gitignore
commitResults.messageBody:
Codebase has level-5 requirements.

Missing level-7 requirements.

Adding the following features allows us to fulfill level-7 requirements
* add persistent storage for list.
* edit icon used for unmark status.

Updating the following for better code management/quality
* add /store/storage-info-txt in gitignore.
* refactor code in Task and its child classes.

commitResults.messageTitle: Remove debug lines from Duke class
commitResults.messageBody:
Codebase has level-7 requirements.

Lingering debug lines in Duke

Updating the following for better code management/quality
* Remove debug lines from Duke
* Add MANIFEST.MF file
